snippet: Gun activists are trying to convince law-abiding gun owners in New York to disobey a sensible law that requires the registration of their assault weapons.
abstract: Editorial decries gun activists who are calling on New York State gun owners to disobey 2013 SAFE Act, strong gun control law that includes a broad ban on semi-automatic assault weapons; points out failure to register assault weapons that were grandfathered in following the law makes them illegal, and subject to confiscation; holds law, passed after Newtown, Conn, massacre, is both sensible and easy to comply with.
lead_paragraph: Gun activists are trying to convince law-abiding gun owners in New York to disobey a sensible law that requires the registration of their assault weapons.
